about.summary: Orders panels in scatterplot matrices and parallel coordinate displays by some merit index. Package contains various indices of merit, ordering functions, and enhanced versions of pairs and parcoord which color panels according to their merit level.

Orders panels in scatterplot matrices and parallel coordinate displays by some merit index. Package contains various indices of merit, ordering functions, and enhanced versions of pairs and parcoord which color panels according to their merit level.

name: r-gclus
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.3.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-gclus
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/gclus_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/gclus/gclus_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6668521a618c4f5c4780004088cd1744c37f5d0a79caa85b2074a4fdd2f68214

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cluster
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cluster

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('gclus')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('gclus')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gclus
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Orders panels in scatterplot matrices and parallel coordinate displays by some merit index. Package contains various indices of merit, ordering functions, and enhanced versions of pairs and parcoord which color panels according to their merit level.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: gclus
# Version: 1.3.2
# Author: Catherine Hurley
# Date: 2019-01-07
# Maintainer: Catherine Hurley <catherine.hurley@mu.ie>
# Title: Clustering Graphics
# Description: Orders panels in scatterplot matrices and parallel coordinate displays by some merit index. Package contains various indices of merit, ordering functions, and enhanced versions of pairs and parcoord which color panels according to their merit level.
# Depends: R (>= 2.10), cluster
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# Suggests: knitr, rmarkdown
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.0
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-01-07 17:20:54 UTC; catherine
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-01-07 20:00:09 UTC
